lessonTable.db_getQuery: SELECT user_inf.id, user_inf.user_name, user_classwork.user_work_status FROM user_inf INNER JOIN user_classwork ON user_inf.id = user_classwork.user_key INNER JOIN classwork ON user_classwork.classwork_key = classwork.id  WHERE classwork.id='id' ORDER BY user_name ASC;

noReserver.text: 現在、当該授業に予約者はいません。
